page.title: 12Clubs in Stallingborough
page.content: Keep Fit: class for ladies in the village hall, twice weekly exercise to music. Brownies: meet Tuesday night. Guides: have their meetings after the Brownies. Playgroup: hold sessions Tuesday mornings for sixteen children, where active play with large equipment takes place. Rifle Club: meets regularly in their premises adjoining the village hall. Good Companions: (over sixties) meet alternate Wednesday afternoons in the village hall for bingo. Mother & Toddlers: meet in the village hall every Thursday afternoon to chat about mutual interests. Womens' Institute: meet monthly at the village hall enjoying interesting talks and demonstrations on craft (women of all ages). Ladies Circle: held in the Chapel Tuesday fortnightly, enjoy talks and demos. on all topics.
